originalText.text: I just moved to the neighborhood and stopped by for a manicure. I called ahead and still had to wait but I didn‚Äôt mind because the staff was very nice. I was lucky enough to get Sunita to do my manicure (she and her husband are the owners) and the experience was lovely. She did a great job and was very sweet. I look forward to making this my weekly manicure pedicure destination. Only negative comment- they need a better variety of colors and some of the polishes seemed to be old.

originalText.text: Absolutely love this place. My schedule is super crazy but they work around it, I suggest making an appointment it‚Äôs easier to just have a come in and go experience. All the girls are super friendly, very attentive, and kind even when speaking. My mani and pedi look gorgeous every time.

originalText.text: I‚Äôm a man and I have never done this before but my wife forced me to do it. Just have to say that I don't regret it one bit. Sunita and staff made me feel comfortable. They did an amazing job on my man hooves, left my hands and feet feeling like they belonged to someone who actually took care of them. I would totally do it again. Thank you Sunita!

originalText.text:
I decided to get a pedicure on the spur of the moment and wondered if the nail salon would be open because it was Labor Day.
They listed that it opened at 10:00 am so I called just to verify they were open, about 10:30 and was told that there was no appointments right away but I could come in about a half hour, and good to it's word they had a seat available for me.   I was taken right away picked out my polish and the person that did the pedicure was very nice very professional she did what she had to do she made sure I was comfortable and it was a very pleasant experience I would definitely suggest giving the place a try. Thank you.

text.text:
I decided to get a pedicure on the spur of the moment and wondered if the nail salon would be open because it was Labor Day.
They listed that it opened at 10:00 am so I called just to verify they were open, about 10:30 and was told that there was no appointments right away but I could come in about a half hour, and good to it's word they had a seat available for me.   I was taken right away picked out my polish and the person that did the pedicure was very nice very professional she did what she had to do she made sure I was comfortable and it was a very pleasant experience I would definitely suggest giving the place a try. Thank you.

originalText.text:
So glad to be back at Sunita for weekly manicures and pedicures and such!  Not only are all the technicians excellent, but the atmosphere is friendly, comfortable and relaxing. They make an effort to get to know their customers but aren‚Äôt intrusive, which I appreciate.  One Sunday evening I left my cell phone there right at closing and realized it nearly an hour later and dashed back hopeful of retrieving it.  Would you believe that the owners were there waiting for me after-hours with my phone, concerned that I would have it for the workweek?  Thoughtful and trustworthy in the extreme!  üôè

It‚Äôs the little things in life that compensate for the daily and weekly stresses and strains. If manicures and pedicures and shoulder rubs are your thing, Sunita is your place!
